title: PBE Sign Ups still closed

embed.description: Â© 2017 Riot Games, Inc. All rights reserved. Riot Games, League of Legends and PvP.net are trademarks, services marks, or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc.

body: Does anyone know when the PBE sign ups are going to be back? It's been four months.

replies.body: Those signups are indeed still down for maintenance while they work on making the process a bit easier for everyone. You can stay updated on their progress by checking the [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
